Genomics_ConceptTask.TEXT: IC, MS, and UT developed the hypotheses and designed the experimental plan. IC, RB, MS, and MM performed and analyzed the experiments and contributed to the interpretation of the data. IC and RB wrote and edited the manuscript. RT, VN, GT, and RI contributed to the data curation. VT, EG, and UT assisted in drafts and final version of the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
